title: Overnight Bangladesh ferry inferno kills dozens, injures scores more. Many passengers jumped off, swam ashore.
content:
1. Overnight Bangladesh ferry inferno kills dozens, injures scores more. Many passengers jumped off, swam ashore.  CBS News
  2. Bangladesh: dozens dead after fire sweeps through ferry  Guardian News
  3. Massive Bangladesh ferry fire kills at least 39  Fox News
  4. Dozens dead in Bangladesh ferry fire  Al Jazeera English
  5. Massive ferry fire kills at least 39 in southern Bangladesh  Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: バングラデシュのフェリーが夜間に炎上し、数十人が死亡、数十人が負傷した。多くの乗客が飛び降り、泳いで岸にたどり着いた。
孟加拉国渡轮一夜之间发生火灾，造成数十人死亡，数十人受伤。许多乘客跳下船，游上岸。
孟加拉國渡輪一夜之間發生火災，造成數十人死亡，數十人受傷。許多乘客跳下船，游上岸。
